actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove the penalty for the underpayment of estimated tax in the case where the underpayment is due to income attributable to a new business started by the taxpayer during the taxable year.

summary.text: Removes the penalty under the Internal Revenue Code for the underpayment of estimated tax in the case where the underpayment is due to income attributable to a new business started by the taxpayer during the taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove the penalty for the underpayment of estimated tax in the case where the underpayment is due to income attributable to a new business started by the taxpayer during the taxable year.
